tr.metin:
Bayram Deder yıllar önce memleketi Mardin‘den İzmir Kadifekale’ye taşınır. İlkokul mezunudur. Hiçbir işte uzun süre çalışamaz, bir mesleği ve birikimi yoktur. Yedi yıl cezaevinde kalır. Çıktıktan sonra da bir iş bulamaz ve tarihi Kadifekale’de derme çatma bir çay ocağı açar.

Mahallede görüp aşık olduğu Emine ile evlenirler. Oğulları Eyüp ve Emir doğar.

Bayram her sabah çay ocağını kurmak için Kadifekale’den geçerken mahallesinin kentsel dönüşümle ortadan kalkmasını izler.

en.metin:
Bayram Deder moved from his hometown Mardin to Izmir Kadifekale years ago. He is a primary school graduate. He could not keep a job for a long time, he did not have a profession or knowledge. He stayed in prison for seven years. After he was out, he could not find a job and opened a scratchy tea house in historical Kadifekale.

He got married to Emine, whom he saw and fell in love with in the neighborhood. Their son Eyüp and Emir were born. As Bayram passes through Kadifekale every morning to open his tea house, he watches the neighborhood disappear with urban transformation projects.

ozgecmis.metin: She was born in 1983 in Izmir. She graduated from Abant İzzet Baysal University Düzce Vocational School Construction Technician. She is still working as a Construction Technician in a private company. She has been working with photography since 2012. As a means of understanding and telling, she mostly works on documentary photography. She has taken part in many mixed exhibitions with her photographs and has many awards in many competitions.
